author: kyave13
title: Training program NOA-NEA Argentina.
description: In Argentina, the ignorance of the Cardano ecosystem is complete with more than 2 million potential users of the network.

assessments.note: This is a region the could use the resource identified by this proposal
The proposal addresses the challenge flawlessly. It implies a focus on sustainability and has large potential to influence the Spanish language area.

The stated aim of the proposal is to train subjects in the use of Cardano, but does not give specifics or a detailed itinerary or even a course catalogue.

In order to fairly assess this proposal more information is necessary to evaluate any such curriculum that may be used  when engaging with people for the very first time and introducing them to the Cardano ecosystem.

the training program proposed is strongly supported by a marketing plan to gain broad outreach and awareness in argentina. More detail in how the awareness would be converted into a self sustaining community center with activities would improve the score.
It is a large number of individuals that the goal aims to reach, without clear project roadmap or fund distribution plans laid out, cannot say it is not likely but cannot say it is either.
This has a high chance to succeed. Yet it is unclear wether the proposer will go at this alone or with a team.

It is unclear weather this proposal is an in-person education or online. If indeed this proposal is in person than current circumstances make this proposal very unlikely to succeed. Given that, I believe more information is needed and thus cannot determine with a high degree of certainty that this proposal will be successfully implemented or not.
the proposer has significant experience in marketing and teaching however no indication was made on the technical skills or a teaching plan.
Good effort with the website creation and mission statement, and general goals, but for the requested funds more details need to be fleshed out at this point.
A roadmap would help with interpreting the fund distribution.
The proposal lacks much needed information to accurately asses the merits of how effectively this proposal can be implemented.

the proposal doesn't include a plan for creation of community centers beyond bringing awareness to the cardano ecosystem. Additional details such as which city the center would be in, how many interactions would be facilitated between the students and entreprenuers and so on would assist in assessing the feasibility of the proposal.

solution: Implement a training program on the use of Cardano, presenting use cases in the Spanish language to multiplying referents.
experience: 10 years of experience as a teacher in the region. Radio producer. Implementation of local training trades.
